alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 3:35AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Douglas County through 415 AM CDT... At 334 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ashby, or 19 miles southeast of Fergus Falls, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, penny size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Evansville around 350 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
